['DescriptionEspace Real Estate is excited to bring to market this stunning custom built villa which sits on a huge 25,000 sqft plot with full Polo field view. Occupying a new total built up area of 18,110 sq.ft (extended by 8,000 sq.ft) this property now offers Seven bedroom suites (two of which are master bedrooms) all with spa inspired en-suite bathrooms and huge walk-in closets. A fully equipped kitchen with high end appliances create a homely environment.Designed to an extremely high end modern standard the villa is a fully functional smart home with Audio Visual, Motion sensor lighting and ipads for smart home controls. The property also offers a fully fitted cinema room and gymnasium.

-7 Bedrooms

descriptions:
['DescriptionThe best villa in Arabian Ranches! This rare type 21 - 5 bed bedroom plus maids villa located in the sought after community of Mirador La Coleccion. This fully upgraded villa offers a large extended reception and dining room, large modern German brand closed kitchen, one large bedroom downstairs, four good sized bedrooms upstairs, maids room and has a large landscaped garden with private pool and BBQ area. Arabian Ranches has such a welcoming community feel in a peaceful and quiet location which makes it the perfect place to bring up a family. This villa will be the perfect property for everyone seeking a place that they can call home.

descriptions: ["DescriptionE &T Real Estate are pleased to present High Quality, Bright & Spacious 3 Bedroom Plus Maid Townhouse in a Brand New Development Maple at Dubai Hills Estate.***Multiple Options Available**** Dubai Hills* Maple 1* Type 2M* 3 Bedrooms plus Maid's room* Built Up Area 2,228 Square Feet* Standard Plot* Great Location within the communityType 2M is Modern Design Townhouse with an Open Kitchen concept along with Living and Dining along with Maids room on Ground Floor.\xa0It has 2 Bedrooms for kids sharing Jack and Jill Style washroom and a decent En-suite Master Bedroom along with walk in closets.Maple is located in the much anticipated community of Dubai Hills Estate. These are 3, 4 & 5 bedroom townhouses which will be handed over in 2019. This is a great location for families looking for a well-planned Emaar community and a prime area locating in the heart of the city. Dubai Hills is located within Mohammad Bin Rashid City and is conveniently located off Al Khail Road and Umm Suqueim Road, only minutes away from Mall of the Emirates and Sheikh Zayed Road. It is also close to elegantly designed gated community - Emirates Living.E & T Real Estate has been trading since 2004 and has become one of the most successful real estate agencies in United Arab Emirates. Our services include Residential Sales and Leasing, Commercial Sales and Leasing, Property Management, and RICS Valuations"]
